message: Not totally sure how this works...
For static graphics, I mostly use R and Illustrator. For interactive, I use some Flash or just plain old JavaScript. D3 once I get the chance.

I do most of my programming in Python.  For interactive rich-client graphics, I use my own tool, Chaco (http://code.enthought.com/chaco).  For static plots, I will sometimes use Chaco or other times use Matplotlib.  I haven't really done much web interactive stuff, except I've been playing around with Protovis.
